TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FederationConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: 公开包含控制 WS-Federation 身份验证模块的联合设置的属性（）和在 Web 应用程序的“会话身份验证模块”（）。

span.span: Exposes properties that contain federation settings that control the behavior of the WS-Federation Authentication Module () and the Session Authentication Module () in web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 web 应用程序具有单个对象，它通过访问属性。By default web applications have a single object that is accessed through the property. 第一次新访问的属性实例初始化从配置文件中的设置和引发事件。The first time the property is accessed a new instance is initialized from settings in the configuration file and the event is raised. 可以使用的属性和方法公开的类来修改或替换为事件处理程序中配置初始化的对象。You can use the properties and methods exposed by the class to modify or replace the object initialized from configuration in an event handler. 此对象是可通过在事件处理程序的属性。This object is available through the property inside the event handler.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 之前的新实例使用的任何已配置的 HTTP 模块，请调用方法，以确保该实例已正确初始化。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 通过加载设置初始化 选件类的新实例从配置文件的 部分。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过加载设置初始化新实例中的属性``配置节。The properties in the new instance are initialized by loading settings from the `` configuration section. 此构造函数调用构造函数与`loadConfig`参数`true`。This constructor calls the constructor with the `loadConfig` parameter `true`. > [!WARNING] > 之前的新实例使用的任何已配置的 HTTP 模块，请调用方法，以确保该实例已正确初始化。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool loadConfig) cil managed

param.name: loadConfig
param.span: 初始化的 与配置文件加载的设置；初始化的 设置为默认值。

span.span: to initialize with settings loaded from the configuration file; to initialize to default values.

summary.span: 通过有选择地加载来自配置文件的 部分的设置来初始化 类的新的实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by optionally loading settings from the section of the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 之前的新实例使用的任何已配置的 HTTP 模块，请调用方法，以确保该实例已正确初始化。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized. `system.identityModel`中，必须指定部分`
`元素下的``元素在配置文件或异常引发。The `system.identityModel` section must be specified in a `
` element under the `` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown. ```
``` 如果`loadConfig`是`true`并只有一个``指定元素，使用该元素加载设置。If `loadConfig` is `true` and only a single `` element is specified, settings are loaded using that element. 如果多个``指定了元素，则方法将尝试加载设置的元素的未命名的从具有。If multiple `` elements are specified, the method attempts to load settings from the element that is unnamed of that has the . 如果此类元素不存在，该方法将返回而不加载设置。If such an element does not exist, the method returns without loading settings. 这会导致出现异常时调用方法。This results in an exception when the method is called. > [!WARNING] > Microsoft 建议，如果指定多个``中的元素`system.identityModel.services`配置至少一个其中的部分是未命名或的其名称设置为空字符串。Microsoft recommends that if you specify multiple `` elements in the `system.identityModel.services` configuration section that at least one of them is unnamed or has its name set to an empty string.

exception.span: 此 配置节未在配置文件中定义。

span.span: The configuration section is not defined in the configuration file.

summary.span: 从指定的名称 [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) 元素初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the [<federationConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration.md) element with the specified name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 之前的新实例使用的任何已配置的 HTTP 模块，请调用方法，以确保该实例已正确初始化。Before the new instance is used by any of the configured HTTP modules, call the method to ensure that the instance is properly initialized. 如果调用此构造函数，然后``配置节``配置文件中必须存在具有指定的名称的元素。If this constructor is called then a `` configuration section with a `` element that has the specified name must exist in the configuration file. 这两个`system.identityModel`部分并`system.identityModel.services`中，必须指定`
`下的元素``元素在配置文件或异常引发。Both the `system.identityModel` section and the `system.identityModel.services` must be specified in a `
` elements under the `` element in the configuration file or an exception is thrown. ```
```

summary.span: 获取或设置将由会话身份验证模块 () 使用的 Cookie 处理程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie handler to be used by the Session Authentication Module ().

value.span: 由会话身份验证模块（SAM）使用的 Cookie 处理程序。

span.span: The cookie handler to be used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定用于读取和写入会话 cookie 由 SAM 的 cookie 处理程序。Specifies the cookie handler that is used to read and write session cookies by the SAM. 初始化从配置文件，设置此属性[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素。When initialized from a configuration file, this property is set by the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed
abstract member Initialize : unit -> unit override this.Initialize : unit -> unit

span.span: Initializes the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确保正确初始化当前实例然后 HTTP 模块使用它来处理传入的请求。This method ensures that the current instance is properly initialized before it is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests. 它应只调用一次。It should only be called once. 检查调用方法之前的属性。Check the property before calling the method. 此方法设置属性设置`true`。This method sets the property is set `true`. 默认实现将创建默认 cookie 处理程序，如果没有一个已配置通过属性并调用通过配置上的标识配置对象方法属性。The default implementation creates a default cookie handler if there is not one already configured through the property and calls the method on the identity configuration object that is configured through the property. 您可以重写此方法可以修改此行为，或者提供派生类中附加的初始化。You can override this method to modify this behavior or to provide additional initialization in derived classes. 在 HTTP 模块使用类来处理传入的请求之前，应调用此方法。This method should be invoked before the class is used by the HTTP Modules to process incoming requests.

exception.span: 当前实例已初始化（ 属性是 。）

span.span: The current instance has already been initialized (The property is .)

summary.span: 为来自配置文件的当前实例加载属性。

span.span: Loads the properties for the current instance from the configuration file.

summary.span: 此方法由从配置设置中初始化新创建的 构造函数调用。

span.span: This method is called by constructors that initialize the newly created from configuration settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数来设置新创建的属性调用方法对象从指定``元素。The method is called by the constructors to set the properties of the newly created object from the specified `` element. 如果`element`是`null`，加载实例时使用默认值。If `element` is `null`, the instance is loaded with default values. 如果没有任何配置文件，或者，如果命名的节不存在，则不引发异常，请改为使用默认值加载该实例。If the there is no configuration file, or, if the named section does not exist, then no exception is thrown, instead the instance is loaded with default values.
